title: World trend, women working in agriculture

content.question: The graph above suggest which of the following?

choices.label: Throughout the world, more women than men work in agriculture.
The number of women working in agriculture worldwide decreased sharply.
A greater proportion of the agricultural workforce in Europe is female than is the case outside Europe.
Changes in the gender balance in eastern European agriculture countered the worldwide trend.
Few people work in the agricultural sector in Latin America and the Caribbean.

content.answer: Changes in the gender balance in eastern European agriculture countered the worldwide trend.

topic.text: 9.5: Calls for Reform and Responses after 1900

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
